title: Who sang the song 'Young Love'? - Quora

response.answer_text: Young Love is a popular song, written by Ric Cartey and Carole Joyner and published in 1956. The original version was recorded by Ric Cartey With The Jiva-Tones on November 24, 1956. It was released in 1956. However, it never get the popularity it deserved. With time this song gained the popularity after being covered by many artists. A few months later, 5th January, 1957, enigmatic country singer Sonny James sung this song as cover as “you are the reason I'm in love" and it became an instant hit. Here is the link of his performance of 1965:  A few days later, 19th January 1957, Actore and singer Tab Hunter sung this and that too reached at #1 Below is the link of his version:  Music is not about the lyrics and beats. It is more like a journey of thoughts. Enjoy!!
